document.full_text: after a frenetic career as producer to frank sinatra, ray charles, michael jackson and many other music legends, 78-year-old quincy jones refuses to slow down and has just signed up for a new project in the arab world.
document.title: no let-up for perpetual music maker quincy jones
lines_and_colors: after a frenetic career as producer to frank sinatra, ray charles, michael jackson and many other music legends, 78-year-old quincy jones refuses to slow down and has just signed up for a new project in the arab world.
